name: use-timeout
title: useTimeout
description: Custom hook that handles timeouts in React components using the [`setTimeout API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope/setTimeout). ```tsx // Usage of useTimeout hook useTimeout(() => {   // Code to be executed after the specified delay }, 1000); // Set a timeout of 1000 milliseconds (1 second) ```
